body_html: I found a temporary fix. Replace the file [...]/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/dist/tf-tensorboard.html with the older version from TensorFlow v0.9. This version can be found here: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/r0.9/tensorflow/tensorboard/dist/tf-tensorboard.html. This way the plots will work again. Hopefully there will be a proper fix soon :-)

body: I found a temporary fix. Replace the file `[...]/python2.7/site-packages/tensorflow/tensorboard/dist/tf-tensorboard.html` with the older version from TensorFlow v0.9. This version can be found here: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/r0.9/tensorflow/tensorboard/dist/tf-tensorboard.html. This way the plots will work again. Hopefully there will be a proper fix soon :-)
